website_summaries.verdict: High-quality camera that provides sharp daytime images, but customers aren't as happy with night vision results.
pros: Compatible with several Smart home systems
Generates activity alerts and provides accompanying snapshots
Ability to speak through the camera
cons: Users say night vision capabilities could be better

customer_reviews.title: Good camera Not great price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: camera quality is better than most cameras during the daytime. Easy set up. Nest platform is easy to use. Nice app for my phone. Cons: Camera quality at night is not great. Nest Aware (Data storage) subscription is expensive as they charge for each camera, although the second camera is less expensive. Expensive to purchase 1, but the 2 camera package is more reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Solid - just works .  Just pay for the subscription and you will be happy
customer_reviews.text: Solid - just works . Just pay for the subscription and you will be happy
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Nest makes the best indoor / outdoor camera, bar none
customer_reviews.text: I own both Nest indoor and outdoor cameras. Quality is unmatched. 30 day video retrieval is possible with minimal charge from Nest. Cameras work with your smartphone and you can download any video and save clips. Best on the market. You will NOT be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerricat

customer_reviews.title: Camera power adapter clearly broken
customer_reviews.text: This was not checked by seller before sending out as the power adapter usb input was clearly mangled with no way of plugging in the cord. Thought I would try this seller one more time and 2nd time the seller sent no power cord or power adapter. Very unhappy and will never use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: pimilo

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up. Clear picture, very clear on the zoom feature.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to activate. Easy to position to capture the view you want. The night vision is good. I like the nest system, very easy to have all cameras seen on one screen. I like the white color. I am pleased with this indoor camera, I will be buying an additional in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the hype!
customer_reviews.text: This camera sets up and works exactly as described. The enhanced cloud subscription that gives it all its features is only $12.00 per month, and I got a 30 day free trial! Now I know when packages are left at my door and I can monitor suspicious activity.
customer_reviews.author: skelly10

customer_reviews.title: Nest camera cable extension
customer_reviews.text: I’ve have used the nest cam and doorbell for over a year and I’m happy with it for the most part. The subscription for recording history seems to be helpful when using it remotely. The cost for multiple google devices had recently become more economical. For me the downside is the camera 15V power cord will not extend beyond 20 feet. However, Coolgear POE (Power Over Ethernet) adapter allows you to power your camera over 300” via cat5 cable. It does require a 48 V POB power injector and a usbc male-male cable, that’s not included. You may also need a special adapter plate for wall/ceiling mounting the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Woodsmithy

customer_reviews.title: Constant Loss of footage -- DO NOT USE FOR SECURITY PURPOSES
customer_reviews.text: I have it because it's better than nothing and too late to return. There are CONSTANT recording gaps. Even from footage a few hours prior. It says the camera was offline (but the internet was on since all my other wifi connected devices are working during the same time periods). Very unreliable -- even with the monthly paid subscription. I might go back to Logitech in the coming year.
customer_reviews.author: Randi M. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Won't Work Without a Google Account!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Every single user you want to have access to your camera has to create their own Gmail address! My company is looking for a replacement solution now that we are being forced to migrate to Google. Nest says the migration is optional, but it's not if you want to add a new user.
customer_reviews.author: Roadhunter

customer_reviews.title: no replacement cord
customer_reviews.text: The camera was great for about 2 years (less actually) but then had to buy a replacement cord... btw good luck with that... and camera hasn't worked since.. red halo is all I get indicating low voltage... i made sure it was compatible down to the molded end that fits into the camera... contacted Google and all their geniuses can't seem to figure it out... very poor customer service... dont buy a product with a self destruct date... i can't even find another replacement cord and this seems to be the problem best solution would be to buy a new camera to replace something thats not even 2 years old
customer_reviews.author: trevor compton
